record.id: field.name="cilevel" and file.name="environment" and term=NULL and format.name=NULL and syslanguage="en"
record.field.name: cilevel
record.file.name: environment

brief.brief: For a business service there is a “Show Members” button which will retrieve all of the downstream children of the business service (at any level). For example, a business service email could have 3 children, each of its children can have 3 children. If Max Levels for Related CI’s for Service is set to 1, the “Show Members” option will only retrieve 3 children, but if the level is set to 2, it will retrieve its 3 immediate children, plus the 9 children of its children.

detail.detail: The Configuration Items Relationship options define the maximum levels to use whenever you select a CI related to other CIs.
